segments.text: When can I move into my new house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The current owners will be moving out on Tuesday , so technically you could pick up the keys and move in on Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will the utilities be turned on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to contact the utility company and make arrangements to transfer the utilities to your name .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really want to paint the walls right away and get the carpet cleaned .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I were you , I would take a few days to take care of those things before you move in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was thinking that I should have my new appliances delivered as we are moving in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be perfect . That way , someone will be there , but you will have them right away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you help me on my move-in day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that I have something else really important to do on that day . I just can â€™ t remember what it is .
segments.speaker: S2
